alston.minecraft

Class HealthBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • alston.minecraft.HealthBar
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class HealthBar
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the visual health bar and contains all interactions with the Player's health.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HealthBar()
      Creates a new health bar with full (10) health.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getHealth() 
      void subtractHealth(int amount)
      Checks for death then substracts health from the Player if he is not dead.
